wikitext.*:
'''John David Ruemmler''' is an American author of role-playing games. In the 1980s, Ruemmler worked as Production Manager for [[Iron Crown Enterprises]], contributing as author and editor to many products relating to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>''Iron Crown Quarterly'', Issue 2, 1988</ref>

==Bibliography, selected==
*[[1983]]: ''[[Northern Mirkwood (1983)|MERP: Northern Mirkwood]]''
*[[1984]]: ''[[Rangers of the North (book)]]''
*[[1985]]: ''[[Night of the Nazgûl]]''
*[[1988]]: ''[[Far Harad: The Scorched Land]]'' (editor)
*[[1988]]: ''[[Mines of Moria (Middle-earth Quest book)|Mines of Moria]]'' (with Susan Mathews)
